Title: Frequently asked questions

FAQs.Question: How often should I have my patio/deck/siding pressure washed in Southwest Houston?
FAQs.Answer: The frequency of pressure washing depends on the local climate and the material of your patio/deck/siding. We recommend consulting with our experts for a personalized recommendation.

FAQs.Question: Do I need to be home during the pressure washing service?
FAQs.Answer: No, you do not need to be home during the service. Our professional team can handle the job in your absence.

FAQs.Question: How long does it take to pressure wash an average-sized home in Southwest Houston?
FAQs.Answer: The duration depends on the size and condition of your home. However, an average-sized home usually takes a few hours.

FAQs.Question: Do I need to remove all outdoor items, such as furniture, before the pressure washing service?
FAQs.Answer: Yes, we recommend removing or covering all outdoor items to protect them from the pressure washing process.

FAQs.Question: Can pressure washing damage my property's surface?
FAQs.Answer: If done incorrectly, pressure washing can potentially cause damage. However, our experienced team uses the appropriate pressure settings and techniques to ensure no harm to your property.

FAQs.Question: What cleaning agents do you use during the pressure washing service?
FAQs.Answer: We use a variety of cleaning agents depending on the surface and level of dirt. All our cleaning agents are environmentally friendly and safe for your property.

FAQs.Question: Are you licensed and insured to provide pressure washing services in Southwest Houston?
FAQs.Answer: Yes, we are licensed, insured, and Better Business Bureau certified to provide pressure washing services.

FAQs.Question: Do you provide any guarantees for your work?
FAQs.Answer: Absolutely! We guarantee your satisfaction at a reasonable and comfortable cost.
